snippet: The National Basketball Association has reached long-term media rights contracts with Walt Disney Co and Time Warner Inc's Turner Broadcasting, more than doubling the fees it received under the previous contracts, the Wall Street Journal reported,...

headline.print_headline: NBA Inks Long-Term Rights Deals With Disney, Time Warner-WSJ
headline.main: NBA Inks Long-Term Rights Deals With Disney, Time Warner-WSJ

lead_paragraph: The National Basketball Association has reached long-term media rights contracts with Walt Disney Co and Time Warner Inc's Turner Broadcasting, more than doubling the fees it received under the previous contracts, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
